response.overview: The American Film Institute series "The Directors" provides one-hour glimpses into the careers of directors whose films have significantly influenced world cinema. Originally a director of award-winning commercials, England's Adrian Lyne moved on to deliver box office blockbusters (Fatal Attraction), cult favorites (Flashdance, Jacob's Ladder) and serious literary adaptations (the remake of Lolita).
response.title: Directors: Adrian Lyne
